net.foxycorndog.arrowide

Class ArrowIDE

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.arrowide.ArrowIDE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.CodeFieldListener, net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.ContentListener, net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.tabmenu.TabMenuListener

    public class ArrowIDE
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.ContentListener, net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.CodeFieldListener, net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.tabmenu.TabMenuListener
    Main class for the ArrowIDE program.

      • setConfigDataValue

        public static void setConfigDataValue(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
        Set a CONFIG_DATA value in the HashMap and the arrow.config file. If the key is not already in the file, it will add it to the end.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property to set.
        value - The value of the property to set.

      • refreshFileViewer

        public void refreshFileViewer(boolean ignoreRemove)
        Refresh the file viewer to all of the updated file names. If a file is no longer existent, then remove it, or if a file has been added, add it to the TreeMenu.

      • contentChanged

        public void contentChanged(net.foxycorndog.arrowide.components.ContentEvent event)
        Implemented method that occurs whenever the content of a TextField is changed. In this case it tells you that the current file has been changed and needs to be saved.

      • setFileSaved

        public void setFileSaved(java.lang.String location,
                boolean saved)
        Set the tab and TreeMenu item associated with the file location to start with a '*' depending if the file is saved or not.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the file to set as saved or not.
        saved - Whether the file is saved or not.

        public boolean tabClosing(int tabId)
        Implemented method that is called whenever a tab's close icon is pressed. If the file in the tab is not saved, ask whether to save it or not.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
